pageContext.claim: “‘Precisely the same program that the Democrats are trying to  Impeach President Trump for supposedly slow walking, tomorrow, right here in the Senate, they (the Dems) say they're going to filibuster for the exact same program.’ @senatemajldr Mitch McConnell. Do Nothing Democrats!”
pageContext.analysis: The Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative budget program is part of the massive National Defense Authorization Act. Lawmakers often vote against the NDAA because of specific programs inside it, but the Ukraine funds have never held up the NDAA in Congress.
